title: remodeled, wood floors, gas stove, laundry, easy commute San Francisco
posting_body: ['Please reply to Eric .', 'Eng @ propsci .', 'com', 'With Corona Pandemic, we do as much as possible with phone calls, emails, videos… hence, when you reply, please indicate your telephone number and a good day/ time to call you for a conversation.', 'Are you ready to sign a rental lease?', 'which is actually a financial contract with long term monetary obligations.', 'Work in San Francisco, but desire affordable housing?', 'The easy solution is to live in West Oakland, just one BART stop from The City.', 'This is a full private entire apartment, not a single room rental, not a shared housing nor roommate situation.', 'PROPERTY:', '- Property type: apartment.', '- Remodeling: kitchen, bathroom.', '- Floorplan: one bedroom apartment, on 3rd floor, up two flights of stairs.', '- Orientation: faces west, at rear of property.', '- Bedrooms: one bedroom.', '- Baths: one bathroom.', '- Ceiling height: 9 feet approx.', '- Flooring: hardwood, carpet, porcelain tiles.', '- Kitchen: granite counters, gas stove and refrigerator supplied.', '- Parking: along public street, no on-site parking.', '- Laundry: shared clothes washer/dryer machines on-site, coin operated.', '- No pets such as animals, dogs, cats, birds, turtles, frogs, or snakes allowed.', '- Kitchen dimensions: 11 feet by 8 feet.', '- Bedroom: 11 feet by 13 feet, not including closet 7 ft by 3ft.', '- Living room: 13 feet by 12 feet, not including closet 7 ft by 4 ft.', '- Bathroom: 7 feet by 5 feet.', '- Overall size: approximately 600 square feet.', '- Sonic fiber internet service available.', 'PUBLIC TRANSIT:', 'BART?', 'The 19th St Station is closest, about 10 blocks east.', 'The West Oakland BART Station is nearby too, about 14 blocks southwest.', '1.2 miles, so a 24 minute walk.', 'Buses?', 'Alameda County Transit (AC Transit) buses run along 14th', 'St and Market St, 2 blocks away.', 'RENTAL REQUIREMENTS:', '- In addition to rent, $70 monthly to owner for water/sewer/trash fees.', 'Separately, tenant pays electricity, gas, cable TV, internet… Tenant pays for disposal of furniture, mattress, sofa, large bulking items.', '- Excellent credit history/score.', '- Rental references needed.', 'We will interview your current/prior landlords.', '- For prior 3 months, please show proof of timely rent payment (cashed checks, for example).', '- No prior evictions, pending evictions, nor near-evictions situations.', '- No lawsuits, arbitrations, settlements, nor disputes with landlords or others.', '- No pets such as animals, dogs, cats, birds, turtles, frogs, nor snakes allowed.', '- Refundable $1,900 security deposit, or more, dependent on history.', '- Tenant must purchase renter’s insurance policy.', '- One year minimum lease duration.', '- If shorter term, then greater monthly rental rate.', '- Free applications, if you provide your credit report and paycheck stub.', '- Upon approval of application, deposit must be paid within 3 days and lease signed and rent paid within 3 days.', '- $5,300 minimum monthly income, verifiable.', '- Financially ready to move?', 'In your bank, you should have enough funds to cover the security deposit, moving costs, utilities, and two months rent.', "- Move-in costs: first month's rent plus security deposit.", '- No smoking indoors, please.', 'Not all applicants will qualify.', 'Please review your own financial situation.', 'The FICO company has the following categories:', '580 to 669 Fair credit.', '670 to 739 Good credit.', '740 to 799 Very Good credit.', '800 to 850 Exceptional credit.', 'Are you financially ready to sign a lease?', 'which is legal contract with long term monetary obligations.', 'UTILITIES:', 'Tenants pay all utilities.', '$70 monthly to owner for water/sewer/trash fees.', 'Separately, the gas, electricity, cable TV, telephone, Internet... companies will mail bills to you.', 'When replying, be sure to reference "Filbert St" in your email.', 'Also indicate if you satisfy the rental requirements or not, and state your timeframe for moving.', 'Are you financially ready to move?', 'If your email lacks specific information, then it will be considered SPAM, unfortunately, and discarded.', 'Please reply to Eric .', 'Eng @ propsci .', 'com', 'Prices and availability are subject to change any time.', 'List prices are for base rent only.', 'Other charges, fees, terms, and conditions may apply.', "Security deposit may fluctuate based on applicant's credit worthiness, rental history, references, verifiable income, and other qualifying standards.", 'Occupancy guidelines apply.', 'An equal housing opportunity provider.', 'Thanks very much.', '1809 Filbert St, near corner of 18th', 'St', 'Oakland, CA 94607']
